devdoc.author: Twifag

params.expiresAt: time when the lock expires (in seconds since UNIX epoch)

params.accountId: of the account that does not exists

params.tokenId: for the token that is attempting to be transferred

params.maximum: time bound (in seconds since UNIX epoch)
params.minimum: time bound (in seconds since UNIX epoch)

params.approvalFunction: that needs to be called to grant approval
params.tokenAddress: that was attempted to be transferred, the function `approvalFunction` should be called on this address

__burn(uint256).details: Only callable by the {Ownable.owner} of this contract

__recoverEther().details: Only callable by the {Ownable.owner} of this contract

__recoverTokens(uint8,address,uint256).details: Only callable by the {Ownable.owner} of this contract

params.tokenContract: address of the token to recover
params.tokenId: of the token to recover; should always be 0 for ERC20 tokens

returns._0: string the absolute best pony (hint: it's Twilight Sparkle)

params.unlockTime: after which locked tokens can be withdrawn (in seconds after UNIX epoch, must be greater than existing `unlockTime` value)

params.amount: of tokens to lock in locker
params.tokenContract: for the token to be locked
params.tokenId: of the token to be locked; should always be 0 for locked ERC20 tokens
params.tokenType: of token to be locked; see {Token.Type}
params.unlockTime: after which locked tokens can be withdrawn (in seconds after UNIX epoch)

transferOwnership(address).details: Can only be called by the current owner.

mareBitsToken.details: Address of the Mare Bits Token contract

devdoc.title: The implementation for the Mare Bits Locker

CallerIsNotOwner(address,address).notice: Thrown when called by any account other than the owner.

InsufficientBalance(uint256,uint256).notice: Thrown when the required balance is less than the available balance

InvalidAmount(string).notice: Thrown when an invalid amount is entered

InvalidCaller().notice: Thrown when called by an invalid caller (such as a contract)

InvalidTokenType(uint8).notice: Thrown when the given token type `tokenType` is not valid.  Must be 1 for ERC1155, 2 for ERC20, or 3 for ERC721

LockedAccount(uint64,uint64).notice: Thrown when attempting to redeem a token for an account that is still locked

NeedsMoreMARE(address).notice: Thrown when someone attempts to interact with this contract who does not hodl $MARE.

NonexistentAccount(uint256).notice: Thrown when the account does not exist

NotTokenOwner(uint256,address,address).notice: Thrown when attempting to transfer a token the caller does not own

TimeOutOfBounds(uint64,uint64,uint64).notice: Thrown when a passed time value is out of the stated bounds

UnapprovedTokenTransfer(address,string).notice: Thrown when the caller has not approved the token transfer

ZeroAmountGiven().notice: Thrown when a zero amount is passed

OwnershipTransferred(address,address).notice: This emits when ownership of a contract changes.

TokenRedeemed(uint256,address,uint256,ad.notice: Emitted after a Mare Bits Locker Token is redeemed for its locked tokens

TokensLocked(uint256,address,uint256,add.notice: Emitted when a token is locked or the lock on a token is extended

__burn(uint256).notice: Internally marks a token as having been burnt

__recoverEther().notice: Recovers ether accidentally sent to this contract or the contracts owned by this one ({MarebitsLockerAccount}, {MarebitsLockerToken}, and {MarebitsVault})

__recoverTokens(uint8,address,uint256).notice: Recovers ERC20, ERC721, or ERC1155 tokens accidentally sent to this contract or the non-vault contracts owned by this one ({MarebitsLockerAccount} and {MarebitsLockerToken})

getAccount(uint256).notice: Gets the account details for the account `accountId`

lockTokens(uint8,address,uint256,uint256.notice: Locks tokens in a Mare Bits Locker and issues a redeemable Mare Bits Locker Token that can be used to unlock the tokens after the time `unlockTime` has passed

owner().notice: Get the address of the owner

redeemToken(uint256).notice: Redeems (burns) a Mare Bits Locker Token and transfers all locked tokens back to the caller

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newAccount`).
